name: Elite Dracomancer
summary: Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons.
description:
Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as paralyze and stinking cloud for a black dragon exemplar). Links to all types of dragons can be found here. You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.Traits

Kobold: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
